elements.title: M & G
elements.description: An international savings and investment business who set specific and ambitious targets in two sustainability priority areas: climate change and diversity and inclusion

elements.title: Zouk
elements.description: private equity with a portfolio comprising digital and sustainable economy companies. Did an [exit with Anesco in 2017](https://www.zouk.com/news/37-technology-growth/94-zouk-sells-stake-in-anesco) after [buying 40% in 2010](https://renewablesnow.com/news/sse-zouk-to-buy-40-stake-each-in-anesco-118744/)
